definition: Yangshao culture (archaeological period with red and black pottery)
surname Yang
to face upward/to look up/to admire/to rely on
surname Shao
(music)/excellent/harmonious
Yangshao neolithic culture from the central Yellow river basin, with red and black pottery

sentences.english: In 1921 the first time in Sanmenxia City, Henan Mianchi Xian Yangshao Village found.
sentences.chinese: 1921年首次在河南省三门峡市渑池县仰韶村发现。

sentences.english: Yangshao culture is matriarchal clan commune system during the cultural prosperity.
sentences.chinese: 仰韶文化属于母系氏族公社制繁荣时期的文化。

sentences.english: Banpo is a typical site of the Yangshao Culture which belonged to China's Neolithic Age.
sentences.chinese: 半坡遗址是一个典型的仰韶文化村落遗址。

sentences.english: The second chapter mostly introduces the archaeological materials of stone shovels in every culture of Pre-Yangshao Culture in Northern China.
sentences.chinese: 第二章详细介绍了北方前仰韶时代各文化出土的石铲。

sentences.english: Shanxi Yangshao period the most distinctive pottery with floral patterns.
sentences.chinese: 仰韶时代的山西彩陶以花卉图案最具特色。

sentences.english: The culture is in the middle of the Yellow River at the New Stone Age.
sentences.chinese: 仰韶文化是黄河中游地区重要的新石器时代文化。
